definition: Hanyang county in Hubei province/historical name Hanyang for Seoul, Korea
Han ethnic group/Chinese (language)/the Han dynasty (206 BC-220 AD)
man
positive (electric.)/sun/male principle (Taoism)/Yang, opposite: 陰|阴[yin1]
Hanyang district of Wuhan city 武漢市|武汉市[Wu3 han4 shi4], Hubei

sentences.english: But after ru-song li river in hanyang paju there is still no offense.
sentences.chinese: 但是李如松過江後駐守坡州仍然沒有進攻漢陽。

sentences.english: He hurried across the river to Hanyang.
In the north, light back to the sea king hanyang, swept all the responsibility.
sentences.chinese: 在朝鮮，光海君回到漢陽，包攬了全部的責任。

sentences.english: Hanyang District makes an invitation to a total of more than 300 enterprises inside and outside.
sentences.chinese: 漢陽區共向300多個境內外企業發出邀請。

sentences.english: And in Hanyang, IT industry and antipollution industry are developing at a fancy speed.
sentences.chinese: 在漢陽，IT產業和反污染產業正以飛速發展。

sentences.english: This is a good way for Hanyang District to quickly gather popularity.
sentences.chinese: 這是漢陽區儘快聚集人氣的好方法。

sentences.english: I own my apartment in hanyang.
sentences.chinese: 我擁有我的公寓在漢陽。
